targetLine.text: My father told me about it.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: How do you know about that?

contextAfter.text: Oh yeah, right. So there I was, mindin' my own business. This crazy old codger with a cane shows up. He says he's my distant relative. I don't see any resemblance. So he says "How would you like to be rich?" So I said "Sure." So he lays this book on me. He says this book will tell me the outcome of every sporting event till the end of the century. All I have to do is bet on the winner, and I'll never lose. So I said "What's the catch?" He says, "No catch. Just keep it a secret." After that, he disappeared. I never saw him again. Oh, and he told me one more thing. He said, "Someday a crazy, wild-eyed scientist, or a kid may show up askin' about that book. And if that ever happens..." Funny. I never thought it would be you.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
